Title: Automatic Recovery of Root Causes from Bug- Fixing Changes
UseOF-SZZ: They did a modification of SZZ filtering more lines suspicious to not be the cause of the bug
Summary:
a combination of machine learning and code analysis techniques to identify root causes from the
changes made to fix bugs.
Outcome: The approach achieves a precision, recall, and F-measure of 76.42%, 71.88%, and 74.08%
